articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: Fortnite returns to the US App Store after a five-year gap - TechCrunch
articles.description: Popular battle royale game Fortnite has finally returned to the U.S. App Store amid game maker Epic Games' lengthy legal skirmish with Apple.
articles.content:
Popular battle royale game Fortnite has finally returned to the U.S. App Store amid game maker Epic Games’ lengthy legal skirmish with Apple.
As of Tuesday, Fortnite is also available on the Epic Ga… [+1179 chars]
